channel.title: Help please read for more info
channel.description: Ok i downloaded jdk 6.0 and it wont let me run my compiler for my server what should i do?

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

You have utorrent or another program (or 2 runserver’s) up using that port try useing another port or find the program thats using that port and close it.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please read for more info

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

[quote=“coinmaker213, post:22, topic:231210”]kk this is what it says “::port:
::43594
::running useing JDK 1.6.0_07…
Error: unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?”
what does this mean?[/quote]

Are you hosting it on Utorrent? If so, close utorrent. Then re-open it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:19, topic:231210”][quote author=`Worx link=topic=304518.msg2440856#msg2440856 date=1221440983]

kk what to do after that?

Run the compiler, and compile. Lol, i suggest saving the compiler to your desktop for ease of acsess.

[/quote]
wont you need to make it a shortcut for that?[/quote]

Ya, but that takes all of 2 seconds. Or when it’s asking you where it should save the file to, just save it to desktop.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

or just use this compiler…
(i made this but its a load of crap…but it compils faster than some other’s)

[code]@echo off

:def
color 0b

:main
cls
title zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :: type in one of the commands below (dont use caps)
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Main options:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: com = Compile your server.
echo ::: run = Run your server.
echo :::
echo ::: Other Junk:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: set = Change settings.
echo ::: creds = Credits
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::
set /p mains=:: Selection:

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds
if %mains%==extra goto extra

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Time to compile…
echo :: Doing stuff…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Checking yo java jdk
echo ::(versions 6u1 to 6u12 only supported and 7u1)
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo :: Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM07
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM06
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_06
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM05
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_05
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_02
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo :: version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo :: go download java…or get up to date lolz
pause
goto main

:extra
cls
title z-i-p-l-0-ck’s creds
echo well dont l33ch this it will make me mad…
echo if you do…die!
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo :: Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN10
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_10…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN09
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_09…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN08
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_08…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN07
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_07…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN06
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_06…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN05
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_05…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN04
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_04…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN03
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_03…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN02
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_02…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN01
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: enter code for background c0l0r.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo ---------
echo :: Enter code for text c0l0r.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Thanks for useing this compiler =P have fun
echo ::
echo :: Thanks to:
echo :: Z-i-p-l-0-c-k for the super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
pause
cls
goto main
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

Whoever made that compiler has a snide sense of humor lol. “to run your homo server”

Anysuch… Take that compiler, coin, and save it in a notepad document. Then once it asks you what to save it as, name it compiler.bat

Read full topic
item.source: Help please read for more info

item.title: Help please read for more info

@coinmaker213 wrote:

kk i copyed and pasted and its still now working

Read full topic
item.source: Help please read for more info

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

then copy and paste this into your compiler

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pr=%programfiles%\Java\ :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 colour %b%%t% :menu cls title Teh ParScape Compiler (R) version 2 echo !!--MADE BY AIRMAX--!! echo Use this compiler, as it powns Joo echo. echo. echo c - Compile your homo server. echo r - To Run your homo server. echo e - To exit out of teh program Sad echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive. Idk wdf it is. echo colour - Change teh Text and Backround colours of this compiler. echo reset - Resets Joo Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==jar goto jar if %c%==Jar goto jar if %c%==JAR goto jar if %c%==colour goto colour if %c%==colour goto colour if %c%==COLOUR goto colour if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :jar title Jar Creator cls echo What will be the name of the Jar file? echo. set /p name=Name: if exist *.class (del *.class) set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\javac.exe set go=jar2 goto cj :jar2 %java% -cp . *java echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest echo Main-Class: server >> manifest set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\jar.exe set go=jar3 goto cj :jar3 if not exist *.class (goto jre) %java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class del runserver.bat del manifest del *.class goto jl :jar4 set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0 set jav=bin\java.exe set go=jar5 goto cj :jar5 echo @echo off >> runserver.bat echo title %name% >> runserver.bat echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat echo pause >> runserver.bat cls echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning echo the Jar file, please post about it in Mod Taharok's 'Perfect echo Compiler' topic on MoparScape. pause goto menu set :colour cls echo Would you like to change the backround colour, change echo the text colour, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround colour. echo text - Change the text colour. echo def - Change all colours back to teh default. echo. echo. set /p colour=Option: if %colour%==back goto back if %colour%==BACK goto back if %colour%==text goto text if %colour%==TEXT goto text if %colour%==def goto co1 if %colour%==DEF goto co1 if %colour%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Plx select a colour to change the backround to: echo. echo black - FTW echo white - FTW echo red - FTL echo yellow - FTL echo green - FTL echo blue - FTL echo purple - FTW echo. echo. set /p back=colour: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Plx select a colour to change the text to: echo. echo black - FTW echo white - FTW echo red - FTL echo yellow - FTL echo green - FTL echo blue - FTL echo purple - FTW echo. echo. set /p back=Colour: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0_07 set jav=bin\javac.exe set go=c2 goto cj :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %java% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully, W00T! pause cls goto menu :c5 %java% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully, W00T! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You must have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0 set jav=bin\java.exe set go=r2 goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class Sad. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command, noob. Please make sure the commands you echo type in are correct. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cj if exist "%pro2%_01\%jav%" (goto sj) if exist "%pro2%\%jav%" (goto sj2) if exist "%pro2%_02\%jav%" (goto sj2x) if exist "%pro%_10\%jav%" (goto sj3) if exist "%pro%_09\%jav%" (goto sj4) if exist "%pro%_08\%jav%" (goto sj5) if exist "%pro%_07\%jav%" (goto sj6) if exist "%pro%_06\%jav%" (goto sj7) if exist "%pro%_05\%jav%" (goto sj8) if exist "%pro%_04\%jav%" (goto sj9) if exist "%pro%_03\%jav%" (goto sj10) if exist "%pro%_02\%jav%" (goto sj11) if exist "%pro%_01\%jav%" (goto sj12) if exist "%pro%\%jav%" (goto sj13) else (goto je) :sj set java="%pro2%_01\%jav%" goto %go% :sj2 set java="%pro2%\%jav%" goto %go% :sj2x set java="%pro2%_02\%jav%" goto %go% :sj3 set java="%pro%_10\%jav%" goto %go% :sj4 set java="%pro%_09\%jav%" goto %go% :sj5 set java="%pro%_08\%jav%" goto %go% :sj6 set java="%pro%_07\%jav%" goto %go% :sj7 set java="%pro%_06\%jav%" goto %go% :sj8 set java="%pro%_05\%jav%" goto %go% :sj9 set java="%pro%_04\%jav%" goto %go% :sj10 set java="%pro%_03\%jav%" goto %go% :sj11 set java="%pro%_02\%jav%" goto %go% :sj12 set java="%pro%_01\%jav%" goto %go% :sj13 set java="%pro%\%jav%" goto %go% :je cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. echo Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section echo for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update Smiley pause cls goto menu :sl cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Airmax's 2nd Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :sl2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Airmax's 2nd Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r6 :cl cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Airmax's 2nd Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c5 :cl2 cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Airmax's 2nd Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c4 :jl cls echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Airmax's 2nd Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto jar4 :reset cls echo Resetting teh Compiler's Logs... pause del "Compile Logs.txt" goto menu

Read full topic

item.source: Help please read for more info

item.title: Help please read for more info
item.dc:creator: @coinmaker213 coinmaker213
item.description:
@coinmaker213 wrote:

@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java” set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pr=%programfiles%\Java
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
colour %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title Teh ParScape Compiler ® version 2
echo !!–MADE BY AIRMAX–!!
echo Use this compiler, as it powns Joo
echo.
echo.
echo c - Compile your homo server.
echo r - To Run your homo server.
echo e - To exit out of teh program
echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive. Idk wdf it is.
echo colour - Change teh Text and Backround colours of this compiler.
echo reset - Resets Joo Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==jar goto jar
if %c%==Jar goto jar
if %c%==JAR goto jar
if %c%==colour goto colour
if %c%==colour goto colour
if %c%==COLOUR goto colour
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:jar
title Jar Creator
cls
echo What will be the name of the Jar file?
echo.
set /p name=Name:
if exist *.class (del *.class)
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=jar2
goto cj
:jar2
%java% -cp . *java
echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest
echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest
echo Main-Class: server >> manifest
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\jar.exe
set go=jar3
goto cj
:jar3
if not exist *.class (goto jre)
%java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class
del runserver.bat
del manifest
del .class
goto jl
:jar4
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=jar5
goto cj
:jar5
echo @echo off >> runserver.bat
echo title %name% >> runserver.bat
echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat
echo pause >> runserver.bat
cls
echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will
echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning
echo the Jar file, please post about it in Mod Taharok’s ‘Perfect
echo Compiler’ topic on MoparScape.
pause
goto menu
set
:colour
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround colour, change
echo the text colour, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround colour.
echo text - Change the text colour.
echo def - Change all colours back to teh default.
echo.
echo.
set /p colour=Option:
if %colour%==back goto back
if %colour%==BACK goto back
if %colour%==text goto text
if %colour%==TEXT goto text
if %colour%==def goto co1
if %colour%==DEF goto co1
if %colour%== goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Plx select a colour to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black - FTW
echo white - FTW
echo red - FTL
echo yellow - FTL
echo green - FTL
echo blue - FTL
echo purple - FTW
echo.
echo.
set /p back=colour:
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Plx select a colour to change the text to:
echo.
echo black - FTW
echo white - FTW
echo red - FTL
echo yellow - FTL
echo green - FTL
echo blue - FTL
echo purple - FTW
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Colour:
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Compiler
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=c2
goto cj
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%java% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully, W00T!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%java% -cp . .\src*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully, W00T!
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You must have Java files for this Compiler to Compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=r2
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class :(. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command, noob. Please make sure the commands you
echo type in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cj
if exist “%pro2%_01%jav%” (goto sj)
if exist “%pro2%%jav%” (goto sj2)
if exist “%pro2%_02%jav%” (goto sj2x)
if exist “%pro%_10%jav%” (goto sj3)
if exist “%pro%_09%jav%” (goto sj4)
if exist “%pro%_08%jav%” (goto sj5)
if exist “%pro%_07%jav%” (goto sj6)
if exist “%pro%_06%jav%” (goto sj7)
if exist “%pro%_05%jav%” (goto sj8)
if exist “%pro%_04%jav%” (goto sj9)
if exist “%pro%_03%jav%” (goto sj10)
if exist “%pro%_02%jav%” (goto sj11)
if exist “%pro%_01%jav%” (goto sj12)
if exist “%pro%%jav%” (goto sj13) else (goto je)
:sj
set java="%pro2%_01%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj2
set java="%pro2%%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj2x
set java="%pro2%_02%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj3
set java="%pro%_10%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj4
set java="%pro%_09%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj5
set java="%pro%_08%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj6
set java="%pro%_07%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj7
set java="%pro%_06%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj8
set java="%pro%_05%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj9
set java="%pro%_04%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj10
set java="%pro%_03%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj11
set java="%pro%_02%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj12
set java="%pro%_01%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj13
set java="%pro%%jav%"
goto %go%
:je
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.
echo Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section
echo for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update
pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Server was run using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank you for using Airmax’s 2nd Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto r5
:sl2
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Server was run using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank you for using Airmax’s 2nd Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto r6
:cl
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank you for using Airmax’s 2nd Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto c5
:cl2
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank you for using Airmax’s 2nd Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto c4
:jl
cls
echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank you for using Airmax’s 2nd Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto jar4
:reset
cls
echo Resetting teh Compiler’s Logs…
pause
del “Compile Logs.txt”
goto menu

Read full topic
